author: fatherjack
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement

Improving the speed of this function will encourage people to use it over the CIM / WMI alternates. Currently this takes 3 seconds to run on my laptop, regardless of how I filter it to restrict results to smaller pieces of info (eg just total memory) whereas if I use Get-CIMInstance CIM_PhysicalMemory it takes 83ms

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as duplicate and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Feature Request - improve speed of Get-ComputerInfo
